entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
